mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into travel_food (destination_id, food_type, restaurant_name, price, description, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) values (#{destinationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restaurantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update travel_food set destination_id = #{destinationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_type = #{foodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, restaurant_name = #{restaurantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, destination_id, food_type, restaurant_name, price, description, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_food where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, destination_id, food_type, restaurant_name, price, description, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_food
